MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am to carry out repairs on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:45am on Friday 23rd April 2021.
